context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

author_email.description: Limit result set to that from a specific author email.

karma.description: Limit result set to that of a particular comment karma.

parent.description: Limit result set to that of a specific comment parent id.

post.description: Limit result set to comments assigned to a specific post id.

post_author.description: Limit result set to comments associated with posts of a specific post author id.

post_slug.description: Limit result set to comments associated with posts of a specific post slug.

post_parent.description: Limit result set to comments associated with posts of a specific post parent id.

post_status.description: Limit result set to comments associated with posts of a specific post status.

post_type.description: Limit result set to comments associated with posts of a specific post type.

status.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific status.

type.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific type.

user.description: Limit result set to comments assigned to a specific user id.

author.description: The id of the user object, if author was a user.

author_avatar_urls.description: Avatar URLs for the object author.

24.description: Avatar URL with image size of 24 pixels.

48.description: Avatar URL with image size of 48 pixels.

96.description: Avatar URL with image size of 96 pixels.

author_email.description: Email address for the object author.

author_ip.description: IP address for the object author.

author_name.description: Display name for the object author.

author_user_agent.description: User agent for the object author.

raw.description: Content for the object, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: Content for the object, transformed for display.

date.description: The date the object was published.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published as GMT.

parent.description: The id for the parent of the object.

post.description: The id of the associated post object.

type.description: Type of Comment for the object.
